title: Installed Android Automotive on Pixel 3XL. How can I restore Android 10 phone OS?
content:
I have installed Android Automotive on my pixel 3 XL.  How can I restore the normal Android OS (meant for phones) on my pixel 3 XL phone?  

Note:  My phone is OEM unlocked, developer options enabled, USB debug is enabled.  

However, when I attempt to use Android Flash tool to flash Android 11 to my phone, the page says:
No devices available
To flash the selected build, manually add a new device by following the steps below.

How can I remove Android Automotive and install the Android 11?
